desc: 地中から発見されることのある古代生物の骨

dictionary.lore: There is an old legend which says that before the gods created human beings, ancient dragons and fish were the inhabitants of Grand Gaia. These ancient bones are said to be the remnants of those gigantic animals that existed long ago. And although this claim hasn't been proven, the fact that these bones that have been discovered deep within the earth are of enormous size cannot be denied, making them the subject of a lot of research.

name: 古代骨
